message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be a great asset and am looking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand your valuation of the product, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $10,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose $12,500 as the price for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for us.
